title: Sidewall - Fragment, 1820–40
creditline: Gift of City of New York, Housing and Development Administration
description: Fragments of pattern printed in ochre and green on light ochre ground. Bits of geometric elements that form square and circle and duplicate the full pattern pictured in Antiques Magazine, XLIV, No. 6, Dec 1943, P. 270. Also, fragment of border imitating architectural molding, leaf in bright yellow, orange, tan, brown on ochre.

participants.person_name: New York City Housing and Development Administration

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall - Fragment, 1820–40. Block-printed. Gift of City of New York, Housing and Development Administration. 1973-8-5-a/i.
